member.name: NOTIFICATION_USER_INPUT_DATA
member.summary: Contains information about how a user interacted with a notification toast in the action center. This structure is used by Activate.

member.name: NOTIFICATION_USER_INPUT_DATA.Key
member.summary: The ID of the user input field in the XML payload.

member.name: NOTIFICATION_USER_INPUT_DATA.Value
member.summary: The input value selected by the user for a given input field.
